Changelog

Stay updated

Follow our changelog to keep yourself updatd

January 10th, 2023

Multiple accounts

Fixed a bug that caused the account summary page to crash when displaying large amounts of data. This issue was primarily affecting users with a high number of transactions and multiple accounts. Our team was able to identify the cause of the problem and implement a fix to ensure a smooth and stable experience for all users.

Read more →

January 7th, 2023

Optimize the database

Improved the load times of the transaction history page by optimizing database queries. We received feedback from users that the page was taking longer than expected to load, especially for those with a large number of transactions. Our developers worked to optimize the database queries and reduce the amount of data being pulled, resulting in faster load times for the transaction history page.

Read more →

December 20th, 2022

Recurring payments

Added a new feature that allows users to set up recurring payments for bills and subscriptions directly from their account. This feature allows users to schedule recurring payments for bills such as rent, utilities, and subscriptions, so they never miss a payment again. They can also view and manage all their scheduled payments in one place. This feature is available for both credit and debit accounts.

Read more →

December 15th, 2022

Overall user experience

Updated the design of the account settings page for a more intuitive user experience. We received feedback that the previous design of the account settings page was confusing and difficult to navigate. Our design team worked to simplify the layout and improve the overall user experience. The new design is more streamlined and makes it easier for users to find and manage their account settings.

Read more →
